description:
Finally, Shoko faces the evil god Eris. As Saori’s Cosmo grows weaker, all of the Saintias—Shoko, Mii, Xiaoling, Katya, and Erda—put their hearts together to challenge Eris. The Gold Saints continue to protect the Sanctuary as they find out Eris’ plan of crashing the temple into it. Aiolia and Milo, who face Saga in a deadly battle, plans to destroy the temple, however…  A raging destiny encircles the Saintias, Gold Saints, evil god Eris, and Saori Kido. The final battle begins
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brillez, jeunes filles ! Aux confins de la noble prière
Kagayake Shoujo-tachi yo! Kedakaki Inori no Hate ni
Shine Saintias! At the End of a Noble Prayer
輝け少女たちよ! 気高き祈りの果てに
